info.name: Used Items
info.description: Need an easy, visual way to keep track of which items your Kith have already used? Or maybe you're collecting something and can't remember what you've already bought. This style helps with that by putting a colored background or border around items you specify.

style.css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://beta.tatteredweave.com") {
/* Solid Background */
img[src$=''],
img[src$=''],
img[src$='']
{ background: #D5E6F7;} /* pale blue */


/* Solid Rounded Border */
img[src$=''],
img[src$=''],
img[src$='']
{ border: 2px solid #ecb0ff; border-radius: 10px;} /* pale purple */


/* Border Top */
img[src$=''],
img[src$=''],
img[src$='']
{ border-top: 2px solid #99ff99;} /* pale green */


/* Border Bottom */
img[src$=''],
img[src$=''],
img[src$='']
{ border-bottom: 2px solid #cc0000; } /* red */


/* Border Left */
img[src$=''],
img[src$=''],
img[src$='']
{ border-left: 2px solid #9966ff;} /* purple */


/* Border Right */
img[src$=''],
img[src$=''],
img[src$='']
{ border-right: 2px solid #996633;} /* brown */
}
